metadata.title: CVE-2019-15679 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.description: TightVNC code version 1.3.10 contains heap buffer overflow inInitialiseRFBConnection function, which can potentially result codeexecution. This attack appear to be exploitable via network connectivity.

criterions.comment: x11vnc package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
tightvnc package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
x2vnc package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
ssvnc package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
vncsnapshot package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
veyon package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
